wikipedia_page.main: Major Thomas "Robin" Valerian Dixon, 3rd Baron Glentoran,  (born 21 April 1935) is a former British bobsledder and Northern Irish politician, known as Robin Dixon. He is a former Conservative Party Shadow Minister for the Olympics.
